Original items: I think that I would like to use this system frequently
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg tror godt, at jeg kunne tænke mig at bruge systemet ofte

Original items: I found the system unnecessarily complex
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg synes, at systemet var unødigt kompliceret at bruge

Original items: I thought the system was easy to use
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg synes, at systemet var nemt at bruge

Original items: I think that I would need the support of a technical person to be able to use this system
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg tror, at jeg ville få brug for support fra en tekniker for at kunne bruge systemet

Original items: I found the various functions in this system were well integrated
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg synes, at mange af systemets funktioner var godt integreret med hinanden

Original items: I thought there was too much inconsistency in this system
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg synes, at systemet var usammenhængende

Original items: I would imagine that most people would learn to use this system very quickly
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg tror, at de fleste hurtigt kan lære at bruge dette system

Original items: I found the system very cumbersome to use
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg synes, at systemet var meget besværligt at bruge

Original items: I felt very confident using the system
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg følte mig sikker på, at jeg kunne bruge systemet

Original items: I needed to learn a lot of things before I could get going with this system
Corresponding items in SUS-DK: Jeg var nødt til at lære en masse ting, for at komme i gang med at bruge systemet
